selected_script.title: The Capybara's Chill: Surviving the Digital Deluge
selected_script.hook: The internet is a wild place. My Zen is stronger than your chaotic DMs.

characters.name: Zen Capybara
characters.visual_prompt: A large, calm capybara wearing tiny, stylish sunglasses, with an utterly unbothered expression.

characters.name: Panicked Sales Rep
characters.visual_prompt: A human sales rep, dishevelled, multiple phones ringing, tabs open on a laptop, sweat beading, on the verge of a meltdown.

objects.name: Tiny Smartphone
objects.visual_prompt: A miniature smartphone, perfectly scaled for a capybara's paw, displaying the Boards keyboard.

objects.name: Multiple Flashing Screens
objects.visual_prompt: Laptop screens, tablet screens, all showing various chaotic social media and messaging app interfaces.

objects.name: Exploding Notifications
objects.visual_prompt: Visual effects of chat bubbles, alerts, and emojis rapidly popping up around the scene.

environments.name: Overwhelmed Home Office
environments.visual_prompt: A cluttered desk in a home office, wires everywhere, half-eaten snacks, general disarray.

environments.name: Digital Vortex Background
environments.visual_prompt: A swirling, colorful, abstract background representing the internet's chaos.

scenes.visual: Panicked Sales Rep is surrounded by multiple flashing screens and exploding notifications. They are visibly stressed, trying to respond to several apps at once, failing miserably.
scenes.audio: Chaotic soundscape: multiple phone rings, notification pings, frantic typing, stressed muttering.

scenes.visual: PULL BACK to reveal Zen Capybara sitting serenely in the foreground, wearing sunglasses, calmly tapping on a tiny smartphone. It opens Boards from its keyboard and effortlessly shares a detailed product video into a chat app on its tiny screen.
scenes.audio: Sudden shift to calm, lo-fi chillhop music. Gentle keyboard taps.

scenes.visual: Capybara looks directly at the camera, gives a slow, knowing wink, and takes a sip from a tiny, invisible coconut drink. The Panicked Sales Rep in the background suddenly looks calm, having also discovered Boards.
scenes.audio: Chillhop continues. Sound of a refreshing sip. Voiceover (calm, deep voice): 'The chaos can wait. Your content can't.'
